name: Dress Up Girls-fun games
description:
Help girls dress up stylishly and become a princess! Choose fashionable clothes, hairstyles, makeup, and even cute pets to find your Mr. Right! You can divine, make fancy clothes. Find the right style and become a perfect beauty! See who's the beauty queen!

1.Tons of hair decorations, accessories, cute pets. Customize your clothes.
2.Dress up like a loli, domineering lady, schoolgirl, or ancient Chinese woman.
3.Dress up for dates, make friends, find your Mr. Right, and have a baby!
4.Join the beauty contest to see who's the beauty queen.
